summary: Light and simple color scheme for Gvim
name: nicotine.vim
description:
This is in fact a slightly customed version of lingodirector colorscheme
(vimscript #1012) by Thomas Schmall.

This is a GUI version just for now.

Thanks:
Thomas Schmall for a great color scheme (lingodirector.vim) and
Bram Moolenaar et al. for the gem that is Vim.
install_details:
Just drop the file in $VIMRUNTIME/colors/
On the command line, type :colo nicotine
